name: Those Nights at Randy's 4 (Demo)
description:
Those Nights at Randy's 4 is a sequel to Those Nights at Randy's 2 (2019) & follows the story of what happened a few years after Randy's Pizza World had been sold off. This game has free roam gameplay with some levels having the standard sit n survive gameplay.

New characters & some familiar faces have come together to help you unravel the mystery with a new horror story.

Free play is a mode in the base game that allows you to play different levels from previous Randy's games, choose a difficulty & complete levels to earn trophy or just play for fun.

The gameplay for these levels in this mode are mixed with free roam & sit n survive.

Those Nights at Randy's 4 includes a escape room mode where players can pick a escape room level & figure puzzles in a limited time to escape. Different levels will have different shorter or longer times depending on the difficulty of the escape room you have chosen.

This game will be supported for 1 year with content, updates & DLC packs. All content in this game can be downloaded on the game page, your game will not update automatically.

Content that will be brought to the game will include:

  • Free Play maps
  • Escape Room maps
  • New Story Mode chapters

DLC that are planned to come:

  • Those Nights at Randy's 4: Halloween Edition (2022)
  • Those Nights at Randy's 4: Christmas Edition (2022)
  • Those Nights at Randy's 4: Easter Edition (2023)

Each edition of the game will be themed differently & will contain exclusive new free play & escape room maps for that edition only.
